name: Shovel Escape
description:
Summary

The massive hole you've spent months digging is collapsing on itself and lava is erupting from underneath your feet! Throw your magical shovel against the falling debris to climb to the top and escape!

Controls

Move Left/RightA / D or Left/Right KeysJump / WalljumpSpace or Up Key (Hold to jump higher!)Throw ShovelLeft Mouse ClickRecall ShovelRight Mouse ClickTeleport to ShovelMiddle Mouse or Q Toggle Music VolumeMToggle SFX VolumeNRestart Game
RToggle Crosshair ColorCToggle FullscreenF1Wipe and Reset HighscoreShift+Ctrl+R (ONLY IF NEEDED)

David Haynes -> https://twitter.com/denglishdesign
